pullrequest.title: Limit the size of the transport buffers

content.raw: On my desktop, I ran pub_atlas_command with vrc_task_2 and rostopic hz the laser scan and one of the multisense camera images and it ran for 1492 seconds sim-time (almost 25 minutes) before out-of-memory.
content.html: On my desktop, I ran pub_atlas_command with vrc_task_2 and rostopic hz the laser scan and one of the multisense camera images and it ran for 1492 seconds sim-time (almost 25 minutes) before out-of-memory.
